name: crunchyroll-dimming
description: Remove screen dimming effect in Crunchyroll

scripts.build:chrome: mkdir -p builds && cp manifest.chrome.json manifest.json && git add -A && stashName=`git stash create` && git archive --format=zip --output=builds/crunchyroll-dimming-chrome.zip $stashName && rm manifest.json
scripts.build:firefox: mkdir -p builds && cp manifest.firefox.json manifest.json && git add -A && stashName=`git stash create` && git archive --format=zip --output=builds/crunchyroll-dimming-firefox.zip $stashName && rm manifest.json
